text:
<!everyone> LAST FEW HOURS OF THE PROGRAMME!! :scream::grin:

>A gentle reminder to close out your conversations with your Mentees and wish them all the best if you haven't already done so! :smile: :+1:

*Note: You will still have access to the channels with your Mentees for a couple of weeks but no longer able to send them messages as of 23.59pm this evening.*

PLEASE also don't forget to do our quick feedback form link here: <https://prospela.typeform.com/to/Cer2WI> <<<<<<<<<< VERY USEFUL FOR US! :relaxed:
